localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

Having a bad day with your boss? Tired of hearing him babbling about ridiculous amount of tasks everyday? Now is your payback time :D. Whack a horde of kage bushin bosses and try to survive!

-Built during Hackademy 24 Hours App/Game building challenge with added 1 more character.

Package size: 58 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

Copyright(C) 2014 FooBar Inc All Rights Reserved.

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
